name: A new Island
description:
A new island is a new game developed by myself that only has three levels.

the rules are simple you just have to collect all the apples to win.

In the next few weeks the game will have new levels and worlds to play for.

This game is in DEVELOPMENT and I would like to donate to development.

Controls:

Movement A and D or the arrows

Jump Space

It would be great to leave a comment with ideas to improve this game.

I say goodbye and thanks for reading

version  0.1.1

Assets by Pixel Frog Link: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/pixel-adventure-1-155360

Font by PixelMush Link: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/pixel-font-tripfive-64734
